traceability.evidence: No ESLint rules or tests implement or reference auto-fix functionality specific to story 008.0-DEV-AUTO-FIX. There are no fixer functions in the format-validation, story-reference, or req-reference rules, and no tests or code mention "008.0-DEV-AUTO-FIX" or implement REQ-AUTOFIX-FORMAT, REQ-AUTOFIX-PRESERVE, REQ-AUTOFIX-TEMPLATE, or REQ-AUTOFIX-SELECTIVE. Only basic missing-annotation fixes exist from earlier stories (003 and 004).
traceability.notes: The auto-fix story 008 has no corresponding implementation or tests. Core auto-fix acceptance criteria for formatting, template configuration, selective fixes, and safe-preserve fixes are not met.
